wikipedia_page.main: Albert Hobson (7 April 1925 – 23 December 2017) was an English footballer who played for Blackpool, Huddersfield Town and York City.

response: Other new names for 1947–48 included Joe Robinson, Albert Hobson and Walter Rickett, but the club sold Jimmy Blair to Bournemouth and long-serving goalkeeper Jock Wallace to Derby County for just £500.Calley, Roy (1992). Blackpool: A Complete Record 1887–1992, p. 28
